entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a person who told Harry about the dangers of wizards meddling with time. She is described as someone who has knowledge and experience in this area.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and he is mentioned as having an idea to meddle with time.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's, and she nudges him to look at the castle. She is also mentioned as walking out of Hagrid's back door with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's, and he is mentioned as walking out of Hagrid's back door with Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a member of the Committee, and he is mentioned as coming down the steps of the castle.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a member of the Committee, and he is mentioned as coming down the steps of the castle.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is an executioner, and he is mentioned as coming down the steps of the castle.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts, and he is mentioned as opening his back door to let Harry, Ron, and Hermione out.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is Hagrid's hippogriff, and he is mentioned as being comforted by Hagrid.

entities.name: pumpkin patch
entities.description: The pumpkin patch is a location where Harry sees himself walking out of Hagrid's back door with Ron and Hermione.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall warned Harry about the dangers of wizards meddling with time.
Hagrid let Harry out of his back door.
Hagrid let Ron out of his back door.
Hagrid let Hermione out of his back door.
Harry and Ron were walking out of Hagrid's back door together.
Harry and Hermione were walking out of Hagrid's back door together.
